name: StarsJam
description:
A multiplayer turn-based match-3 game, which can also be played in single-player.

It presents a concept, in order for the player to get a feel for the competitive spin-off of this type of game and decide whether he would like to play a fully fledged version of this type.

Music Credits
- HektikMusic, Calm in Space
- InfinitumSpace, Electronic Infinite Space

If you like the concept, please vote for it in the Steam Greenlight main page.
